activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API INDEX 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서INDEX 번호를 읽어옵니다.

text.value:
INSERT INTO cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq (type, row_id, qty, crt_dt, crt_user) 
VALUES (
  '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}'
  , (SELECT NVL(MAX(row_id), 0) + 1 FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}')
  , '@{variables('endIdx')}'
  , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhhmiss')
, 'system'
);

activities.name: ORA GET CNT
activities.description: 저장된 값의 Total 값을 확인하기 위해 DB조

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT NVL(max(qty), 0) as total_cnt FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = ''', pipeline().parameters.ServiceId, ''' ORDER BY row_id DESC ')

query.value:
select a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.include_keyword,',') as include_keyword
      ,a.exclude_keyword 
      ,string_agg(a.include_keyword,'||') as api_include_keyword
      , case when replace(a.exclude_keyword ,',','||') = '' then '%23%40VK%23S1%23%EC%A0%95%EC%B9%98'
            else replace(a.exclude_keyword ,',','||')  || '%23%40VK%23S1%23%EC%A0%95%EC%B9%98'
            end as api_exclude_keyword_new
      ,replace(a.exclude_keyword ,',','||') as api_exclude_keyword
  from (
		select gubun   
		      ,reason 
		      ,keyword		    
		      ,exclude_keyword 
		      ,case when regexp_match( include_keyword,',') is not null then '('||replace(include_keyword,',','&&')||')'
		            else include_keyword
		        end include_keyword         
		  from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_keyword
       ) a              
group by  a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword  
       ,a.exclude_keyword 
order by a.gubun, a.reason, a.keyword
;

delete from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}';


insert into cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data
(
 "date" 
	,gubun
	,reason
	,keyword
	,include_keyword
	,exclude_keyword 
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
)
select "date" 
	,gubun
	,reason
	,keyword
	,include_keyword
	,exclude_keyword 
	,title
	,url
	,writername 
	,writerrealname 
	,documentdate
 from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_data_temp
 where date between '@{variables('date')}' and '@{variables('date2')}'
 and writername in
 (
  'KBS'
,'SBSBiz'
,'강원도민일보'
,'강원일보'
,'경향신문'
,'국민일보'
,'국제신문'
,'노컷뉴스'
,'농민신문'
,'뉴스1'
,'뉴시스'
,'대전일보'
,'데일리안'
,'동아일보'
,'매일경제'
,'머니투데이'
,'문화일보'
,'부산일보'
,'아시아경제'
,'연합뉴스'
,'이데일리'
,'조선일보'
,'중앙일보'
,'파이낸셜뉴스'
,'한겨레'
,'한국경제'
,'한국일보'
,'헤럴드경제'
 );

select 1 as su;

select a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,',') as inculde_keyword
      ,a.exculde_keyword 
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,'||') as api_inculde_keyword
      ,replace(a.exculde_keyword ,',','||') as api_exculde_keyword
  from (
		select gubun   
		      ,reason 
		      ,keyword		    
		      ,exculde_keyword 
		      ,case when regexp_match( inculde_keyword,',') is not null then '('||replace(inculde_keyword,',','&&')||')'
		            else inculde_keyword
		        end inculde_keyword         
		  from cd_ods.tb_srm_news_keyword
       ) a              
group by  a.gubun   
      ,a.reason 
      ,a.keyword  
       ,a.exculde_keyword 
order by a.gubun, a.reason, a.keyword

WITH vw_last_date AS (
	SELECT 
    to_char(now() - interval '2 day', 'YYYYMMDD') as start_date,
     to_char(now() - interval '2 day', 'YYYYMMDD') as end_date
)
select b.key_id, b.topic, unnest(array['blog','twitter&excludeKeyword=rt','news','insta','community']) as channel
, a.start_date, a.end_date
from vw_last_date a
, (
select topic, key_id from cd_portal.tb_topic_master
where use_yn = 'Y'
and new_traker  = 'N'
and key_id between '001' and '040'
) b

delete from  cd_ods.tb_vive_topic_association_tran_t;

select 1 as success;
select cd_ods.fn_vive_topic_association_tran_update();

select '20250801' as start_date, '20250831' as end_date, channel, c.keyword, c.include_keyword, c.exclude_keyword from 
unnest( array['twitter','blog','news','insta','community','youtube_new']) as channel, 
cd_ods.temp_vive_api_test_topic c
;

properties.description: PG데이터 lake에 이동 및 테이블 데이터 삭제

query.value:
select format(
    'select * from %I.%I where %I <= %s',
    schema_name,
    table_name,
    date_column_name,
    case
        when date_column_type = 'timestamp'
        then
            format(
                'now() - interval ''1 %s'' * %s',
                retention_unit,
                retention_value
            )
        else
            format(
                'current_date - interval ''%s %s''',
                retention_value,
                retention_unit
            )
    end
)  as query,
lake_container, lake_path_template, schema_name, table_name,date_column_name, table_storage_type, delete_strategy,file_format , delete_batch_size
from cd_meta.table_retention_policy
where is_active = true
@item().query
select cd_mart.func_dm_fm_association_frequency();
select cd_mart.func_dm_kr_ap_use_summary();
select cd_mart.func_dm_pt_home_data();
select cd_mart.func_dm_pt_home_data_new();

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
 WHERE SALES_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SALES_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
 WHERE SALES_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND SALES_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD')

select to_char(min(base_date),'YYYYMMDD') AS SDATE
         ,to_char(MAX(base_date),'YYYYMMDD') AS EDATE
    from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst
   where CMONTH2 between to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')
   GROUP BY CMONTH2
   ORDER BY CMONTH2

SELECT *
 FROM CD_DDREAM.POS_DD_SALES
WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN '@{item().SDATE}' AND '@{item().EDATE}'

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE
    FROM CD_ODS.POS_DD_SALES
    WHERE SALES_DATE BETWEEN  '@{item().SDATE}' AND '@{item().EDATE}'

query.value: select cd_mart.func_dm_pr_datadream_summary('@{startOfMonth(addToTime(addHours(utcNow(), 9), -1, 'Month'), 'yyyyMM')}') as rtn;
select cd_mart.func_dm_pr_datadream_summary('@{startOfMonth(addHours(utcNow(), 9), 'yyyyMM')}') as rtn;

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(SUBSTR(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6)) CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE SUBSTR(',pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ', 1, 6) = ', item().CALMONTH)

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DWRS.SC_EVENT_PLAN_COMPLETE
 WHERE EVENT_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND EVENT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT *
  FROM CD_DWRS.SC_EVENT_PLAN_COMPLETE
 WHERE EVENT_DATE >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND EVENT_DATE <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD')
